content: shrug & shell bag for 18 doll here s a miniature version of my cream shells handbag sized to fit any fashionable 18 doll plus a fun fur shrug for those chilly days materials for handbag 1 oz any sport weight or baby yarn model is crocheted in phentex baby cream color for shrug 2 oz any eyelash yarn model is crocheted in phentex fashion eight color beige crochet hook size i you may wish to use a hook a size or two smaller if you are a looser crocheter yarn needle small length of ribbon model is shown with brown nylon 5/8 ribbon with white polka dots 2 gold jump rings approximately 5/8 diameter abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet round = round beg = beginning space = space instructions note work is not turned at end of each row chain 12 round 1 2 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in each chain across working 5 double_crochet in last chain turn work and continue working along opposite side of chain working double_crochet in each chain work 2 double_crochet in last chain and join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 round 2 chain 3 3 double_crochet in same st skip 2 sts * 4 double_crochet in next st skip 2 sts repeat from * around join as for last round rnds 3 - 5 slip_stitch in next double_crochet and into space before next double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet work 4 double_crochet-shell in space between the middle dcs of each shell around join as for round 2 round 6 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join do not fasten yarn make carrier straps round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 3 turn counts as first double_crochet for next row 3 dcs round 2 2 double_crochet fasten yarn with right side of bag facing you count over 13 sts and attach yarn in next st work as for first strap slide ring onto each strap fold strap in half toward inside of bag and sew end of strap to inside top edge of bag shoulder strap chain 40 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain across working 3 single_crochet in last chain turn work along opposite side of chain work single_crochet in each chain working 2 single_crochet in last chain slip_stitch to top of beg single_crochet fasten yarn slide each end of strap through a carrier strap ring fold up ½ of strap toward inside and sew in place weave ribbon through spaces between shells on top row of bag tie bow bag may be lined if desired shrug v = v_stitch double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in same space note i did not turn rnds when crocheting the sleeves as the eyelash yarn obscures right and wrong sides however you may wish to turn rnds if using a sport weight or baby yarn instructions with i hook chain 20 row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet skip
